MTGCardAlias.description: Represents a foreign name for a Magic: The Gathering card.
MTGCardAlias.title: MTGCardAlias

MTGCardRuling.description: Represents a ruling for a Magic: The Gathering card.
MTGCardRuling.title: MTGCardRuling

description: Represents a Magic: The Gathering card with additional fields for MTGIO.

names.description: List of names the card can have
names.title: Names

mana_cost.description: Mana cost of the card in {X}({C}*) format
mana_cost.title: Mana Cost

colors.description: List of colors the card belongs to
colors.title: Colors

color_identity.description: List of colors that define the card's identity (color codes, e.g. ['R', 'U'])
color_identity.title: Color Identity

rarity.description: Rarity of the card (e.g., common, uncommon, rare, mythic)
rarity.title: Rarity

types.description: List of types the card belongs to (e.g. Creature, Instant, Sorcery, Artifact, Enchantment, Land, Planeswalker)
types.title: Types

subtypes.description: List of subtypes the card belongs to (e.g. Human, Wizard, Squirrel)
subtypes.title: Subtypes

supertypes.description: List of supertypes the card belongs to (e.g. Basic, Legendary, Snow, World, Ongoing)
supertypes.title: Supertypes

text.description: Oracle text of the card. May contain mana symbols and other symbols.
text.title: Text

flavor.description: Flavor text of the card, if any
flavor.title: Flavor

layout.description: Layout of the card (e.g., normal, split, flip, double-faced, token, plane, scheme, phenomenon, leveler, vanguard, aftermath)
layout.title: Layout

rulings.description: List of rulings for the card
rulings.title: Rulings

foreign_names.description: List of foreign names for the card
foreign_names.title: Foreign Names

printings.description: List of sets the card has been printed in
printings.title: Printings

id.description: Unique identifier for the card in the MTGIO database (SHA1 hash of setCode + cardName + cardImageName)
id.title: Id

multiverse_id.description: Multiverse ID of the card, if available
multiverse_id.title: Multiverse Id

image_url.description: URL to the card's image in the MTGIO database
image_url.title: Image Url

title: MTGIOCard
